Package ca.umontreal.iro.ift2255.equipe13

Class Service

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.umontreal.iro.ift2255.equipe13.Service
  • public class Service
extends java.lang.Object
    A service given by the GYM. Contains all necessary data (service ID, name, ...) and a list of sessions. Also contains all the necessary methods for the service or the creation/cancellation of sessions.

        Parameters:
        recurrence - an array of strings representing the day of the week : "MONDAY" ...
        Returns:
        True if the new recurrence has been successfully updated, or false if not.

      • fetchDaySession

        public Session fetchDaySession​(java.time.LocalDate day)

        Parameters:
        day - a LocalDate date.
        Returns:
        a session or null.

      • makeRegistrationForToday

        public boolean makeRegistrationForToday​(Member member,
                                        java.lang.String comments)

        Parameters:
        member - a member.
        comments - comments, maximum 100 characters.
        Returns:
        True if the member has been successfully registered, or false if not.

      • cancelSession

        public boolean cancelSession​(java.lang.String canceledSessionDateString)
        Cancels the session at the specified date (if it exists) of this service instance.
        Parameters:
        canceledSessionDateString - the String of a valid date in format "dd-mm-yyyy".
        Returns:
        True if the matching session has been cancelled, or false if not.
